name: Jungle Sniper Hunting 2016: Go On Sport Hunting this Winter
name_original: Jungle Sniper Hunting 2016: Go On Sport Hunting this Winter
description:
After hitting five millions downloads of Jungle Sniper Hunting 3D, We present you with New Year's gift. With more interesting , more exciting things for you, new amazing jungle environments, thrill hunt with variety of animals, unlimited number of hunting challenges. More hunting challenges and more weapons will be released in coming updates.
If you have played our previous game Jungle Sniper Hunting 3D, you will certainly love the new design. If you're new to us this is the best game for you, Learn the art of sniper shooting and hunting in jungle.


Game Story

You are in jungle with your beloved sniper rifle, the Jungle you have dreamed off, you have imagined. Experience the thrill, the adrenaline, the action with sniper gun against beasts.

Top Features
1. Realistic Jungle Hunt Environment
2. Different beasts to hunt down
3. Unlimited number of hunts
4. Realistic Sniper Shooting Experience.
5. Included birds hunting missions.
6. Special X-Ray scanner to hunt in dark night missions

How to Play
1. You are presented with mission, clear it to play next.
2. Swipe in left center of screen. take aim, zoom, shoot at target
3. navigate in forest on swiping on left center of your phone
4. use zoom and shooting buttons for hit,
5. Keep eye on time.
6. Activate infrared to search prey in dark

Support

Privacy Policy
We don't collect any personal information , any non-personal information collected by our partners like Google is used for analytic and game improvements. For details

check here
